name: 邱家吉
objective: 本課程介紹土壤之基本性質、力學特性及其分析方式，課程內容包括(1)土壤基本性質、(2)土壤分類、(3)土壤滲流、(4)土壤夯實、(5)土壤壓密作用、(6)土壤之強度，使同學理解如何探討土壤之力學行為，並熟知相關理論，計算及實驗方法。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Soil composition and soil behavior
Week 3 Soil classification
Week 4 Notation, tensor, Mohr circle and elasticity
Week 5 Permeability
Week 6 Seepage in soil
Week 7 Soil compaction
Week 8 Soil compaction
Week 9 Midterm exam
Week 10 Soil consolidation
Week 11 Soil consolidation
Week 12 Stress in soil
Week 13 Stress in soil
Week 14 Stress in soil
Week 15 Strength of soil
Week 16 Strength of soil
Week 17 Strength of soil
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy: 期中考 (35%)、期末考 (35%)、作業、出缺席與平時表現 (30%)
materials: Braja M. Das (2002), Principles of Geotechnical Engineering
